item.title: My wifi's connected, but there's no internet…? (Intel Centrino versus Ubuntu)
item.dc:creator: Steven Maude
item.description: Describes how to fix an issue with Intel Centrino wireless adapters using iwlwifi seeing wifi, but not connecting.

item.title: Arduous lessons in Python: why main() is useful
item.dc:creator: Steven Maude
item.description: Why if __name__ == '__main__' is a sensible check in code you’re reusing.

item.title: Windows Update locking up on XP when checking for updates: fixing the svchost.exe CPU usage problem
item.dc:creator: Steven Maude
item.description: How to fix the recent (2013) freezing of Windows Update on XP machines due to svchost.exe being stuck at full (100%) CPU usage.

item.title: It's not often that I think of technical fixes as favourites, but…

item.description: Fixing a common charging issue of the Logitech MX Revolution where the battery red LED flashes when charging.
